function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through mid-air tactile enabling technologies.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underutilization of touch-enabling sensory technologies in online retail","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to physical proximity in virtual reality shopping experiences.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical interaction with ar installations and shared smartphone usage can increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination risk from vr equipment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission through physical contact with payment devices and surfaces in stores.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate space in stores can lead to crowded and congested environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of products in stores may lead to increased physical interactions and longer shopping durations, contributing to disease transmission.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to contact with products in stores.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased waiting lines and congestion at store entrances due to limited capacity.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary surfaces and lack of hand disinfecting points","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unregulated use of cash payments","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hygiene standards in food service establishments","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of staff health and provision of protective clothing","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Banks giving importance to protecting loans and assets","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased use of masks and mask production can contribute to environmental waste and pollution","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid production and adoption of new mask technologies may lead to quality and safety issues","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Littering of masks and gloves in public spaces","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of coffee yarn and silver nanotechnology in the face mask","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reuse of the mask filter without proper cleaning or replacement","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antimicrobial face mask becoming a potential source of viral transmission if not handled properly","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate decomposition of the coffee face mask after being discarded","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective protection against air particulate matter","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection of used coffee from various sources may introduce contamination and pathogens into the production process","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Importing materials from different locations increases the risk of introducing foreign pathogens and contaminants into the manufacturing process","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollution from fashion industry contributing to carbon emissions and ocean pollution","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases such as covid-19 due to close interaction in the built environment.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of disposable face masks contributing to environmental pollution and waste.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental pollutants play a significant role in the spread of covid-19","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of goods in grocery retail stores","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through touch-based technology, such as self-checkout counters","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow adoption of self-checkout technology","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in supermarkets leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on single suppliers","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of agility in supply chain","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Retailers sourcing from a wider geographic region may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases through the distribution chain.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Operating 24/7 and providing retail services whenever and wherever the consumer demands may increase the risk of transmission of contagious diseases due to higher foot traffic and frequent interactions.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate replenishment of goods during the pandemic resulted in consumers quickly switching to other retailers, potentially increasing the spread of contagious diseases as people move between different stores and locations.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased workload in supermarkets","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long queues and crowded stores","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in the supply chain due to pandemic-related measures","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in smaller retailers leading to higher risk of infection","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High demand for groceries leading to crowded supermarkets","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bottleneck in distribution channel due to surge in demand","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influx of chinese tourists during chinese new year","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in grocery retail operations due to covid-19","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protections for employees","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Medical and psychological maladies due to stress and isolation","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Employees facing financial insecurity due to covid-19 impacting employment and housing","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emotional health and well-being of employees at risk due to social distancing and isolation","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"}]}
